khioot_db_erd.md.value:
erDiagram
    TENANT ||..|| SUBSCRIPTION : has
    TENANT ||--o{ BRANCH : owns
    TENANT ||--o{ USER : has
    USER }o--o{ ROLE : has
    TENANT ||--o{ PRODUCT : sells
    PRODUCT ||--|{ CATEGORY : in
    PRODUCT ||--o{ PRODUCT_OPTION : has
    PRODUCT_OPTION ||--o{ OPTION_VALUE : with
    PRODUCT_OPTION }o--o{ PRODUCT_PRICE : affects
    PRODUCT ||--o{ PRODUCT_IMAGE : displays
    ORDER }|..|{ USER : places
    ORDER ||--|{ ORDER_ITEM : has
    ORDER_ITEM ||--|| PRODUCT : of
    ORDER_ITEM ||--o{ CUSTOMIZATION : includes
    ORDER_ITEM ||--o{ MEASUREMENT : includes
    MEASUREMENT }|..|{ CUSTOMER : belongs
    ORDER }|..|{ BRANCH : for
    ORDER ||--o{ ORDER_STATUS : passes_through
    TENANT ||--o{ ADMIN : manages
    INVOICE ||--|| ORDER : for

routes/web.php.value:
<?php
use App\Http\Controllers\Tenant\ProductController;
use App\Http\Controllers\StorefrontController;
use App\Http\Controllers\OrderController;

Route::middleware(['web'])->group(function () {
    Route::get('tenant/dashboard', [ProductController::class, 'dashboard']);
    Route::get('tenant/products/create', [ProductController::class, 'create']);
    Route::post('tenant/products', [ProductController::class, 'store']);
    Route::get('store/{tenant}', [StorefrontController::class, 'index']);
    Route::get('store/{tenant}/order/{product}', [OrderController::class, 'create']);
    Route::post('store/{tenant}/order/{product}', [OrderController::class, 'store']);
    Route::get('invoice/{order}', [OrderController::class, 'invoice']);
});

<?php
namespace App\Models;
use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Model;

class Product extends Model
{
    protected $fillable = [
        'tenant_id', 'name', 'description', 'price', 'type', 'custom_options', 'stock', 'image'
    ];
    protected $casts = ['custom_options' => 'array',];
    public function tenant() { return $this->belongsTo(Tenant::class);}
}

app/Http/Controllers/Tenant/ProductContr.name: app/Http/Controllers/Tenant/ProductController.php
app/Http/Controllers/Tenant/ProductController.php
app/Http/Controllers/Tenant/ProductController.php
app/Http/Controllers/Tenant/ProductContr.value:
<?php
namespace App\Http\Controllers\Tenant;

use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
use App\Models\Product;
use Illuminate\Http\Request;

class ProductController extends Controller
{
    public function dashboard()
    {
        $products = Product::where('tenant_id', auth()->user()->tenant_id)->get();
        return view('tenants.dashboard', compact('products'));
    }
    public function create()
    {
        return view('tenants.products');
    }
    public function store(Request $request)
    {
        $data = $request->validate([
            'name'=>'required', 'description'=>'nullable', 'price'=>'required', 
            'type'=>'required', 'stock'=>'required', 'image'=>'nullable|image'
        ]);
        $data['tenant_id'] = auth()->user()->tenant_id;
        if($request->hasFile('image')){
            $data['image'] = $request->file('image')->store('products', 'public');
        }
        Product::create($data);
        return redirect('tenant/dashboard');
    }
}

<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="onSubmit" enctype="multipart/form-data">
    <input v-model="form.name" placeholder="ุงุณู ุงูููุชุฌ" required>
    <textarea v-model="form.description"></textarea>
    <input v-model.number="form.price" type="number" placeholder="ุงูุณุนุฑ">
    <select v-model="form.type">
      <option value="dress">ุซูุจ</option>
      <option value="fabric">ููุงุด</option>
    </select>
    <input v-model.number="form.stock" type="number" placeholder="ุงููุฎุฒูู">
    <input type="file" @change="uploadImage">
    <!-- ุฎูุงุฑุงุช ุฅุถุงููุฉ ููููุฉ -->
    <button type="submit">ุงุถุงูุฉ ุงูููุชุฌ</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script setup>
import {ref} from 'vue'
const form = ref({
  name: '', description: '', price: 0, type: 'dress', stock: 0, image: null
})

function uploadImage(e) {
  form.value.image = e.target.files[0]
}

async function onSubmit() {
  const data = new FormData()
  for (let key in form.value) data.append(key, form.value[key])
  await fetch('/api/products', {method: "POST", body: data})
  alert('ุชูุช ุฅุถุงูุฉ ุงูููุชุฌ!')
}
</script>

    <input v-model.number="form.price" type="number" placeholder="ุงูุณุนุฑ">

    <button type="submit">ุฅุถุงูุฉ</button>

</template>
<script setup>
import {ref} from 'vue';
const form = ref({name:'', price:0, type:'', image:null});
function uploadImage(e){ form.value.image = e.target.files[0] }
async function onSubmit(){
  let fd = new FormData();
  Object.entries(form.value).forEach(([k,v])=>fd.append(k,v));
  await fetch('/api/products',{method:'POST',body:fd});
  alert('Done!');
}
</script>

namespace App\Http\Controllers;

use App\Models\Tenant;

class StorefrontController extends Controller
{

class Measurement extends Model

}

use Illuminate\Database\Migrations\Migration;
use Illuminate\Database\Schema\Blueprint;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Schema;

return new class extends Migration {
    public function up(): void
    {
        Schema::create('products', function (Blueprint $table) {
            $table->id();
            $table->unsignedBigInteger('tenant_id');
            $table->string('name');
            $table->text('description')->nullable();
            $table->decimal('price', 10, 2);
            $table->string('type')->default('dress');
            $table->json('custom_options')->nullable();
            $table->integer('stock')->default(0);
            $table->string('image')->nullable();
            $table->timestamps();
            $table->foreign('tenant_id')->references('id')->on('tenants')->onDelete('cascade');
        });
    }
    public function down(): void
    {
        Schema::dropIfExists('products');
    }
};

app/Models/Tenant.php.value:
<?php
namespace App\Models;
use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Model;

class Tenant extends Model
{
    protected $fillable = ['name', 'domain', 'owner_name', 'owner_email'];
    public function products() { return $this->hasMany(Product::class);}
    public function orders() { return $this->hasMany(Order::class);}
}

app/Models/Order.php.name: app/Models/Order.php
app/Models/Order.php
app/Models/Order.php.value:
<?php
namespace App\Models;
use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Model;

class Order extends Model
{
    protected $fillable = [
        'tenant_id','product_id','customer_name','phone','quantity','total_price'
    ];
    public function tenant() { return $this->belongsTo(Tenant::class);}
    public function product() { return $this->belongsTo(Product::class);}
    public function measurement() { return $this->hasOne(Measurement::class);}
}

app/Http/Controllers/OrderController.php.name: app/Http/Controllers/OrderController.php
app/Http/Controllers/OrderController.php
app/Http/Controllers/OrderController.php.value:
<?php
namespace App\Http\Controllers;

use Illuminate\Http\Request;
use App\Models\Tenant;
use App\Models\Product;
use App\Models\Order;
use App\Models\Measurement;

class OrderController extends Controller
{
    public function create(Tenant $tenant, Product $product)
    {
        return view('storefront.order', compact('tenant', 'product'));
    }
    public function store(Request $request, Tenant $tenant, Product $product)
    {
        $data = $request->validate([
            'customer_name'=>'required',
            'phone'=>'required',
            'quantity'=>'integer|min:1',
            'height'=>'required|numeric',
            'shoulder'=>'required|numeric',
            'sleeve_length'=>'required|numeric',
            'chest_width'=>'required|numeric'
        ]);
        $order = Order::create([
            'tenant_id'=>$tenant->id,
            'product_id'=>$product->id,
            'customer_name'=>$data['customer_name'],
            'phone'=>$data['phone'],
            'quantity'=>$data['quantity'],
            'total_price'=>$product->price * $data['quantity']
        ]);
        Measurement::create([
            'order_id'=>$order->id,
            'customer_name'=>$data['customer_name'],
            'phone'=>$data['phone'],
            'height'=>$data['height'],
            'shoulder'=>$data['shoulder'],
            'sleeve_length'=>$data['sleeve_length'],
            'chest_width'=>$data['chest_width'],
        ]);
        return redirect('invoice/'.$order->id);
    }
    public function invoice(Order $order)
    {
        return view('orders.invoice', compact('order'));
    }
}
